subject: Tether Joins Top 20 US Treasury Holders
body: View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/18dc8e2b-5317-4953-95d2-588f77202e65/image.png?t=1726042519) Caption: ðŸ“¢**[Sponsor](https://forms.gle/HcAfDZZeqF7U15Eo6)**** | **ðŸ’¡**[Telegram](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)**** | **ðŸ“°**[Past Editions](https://launchy.beehiiv.com/)** **Good Morning.** Crypto just reminded everyone it's not a one-way street. July ended with record highs and surging volumes, but August opened with ETF outflows and layoffs. Momentum remains strong, yet so does volatility. As TradFi and DeFi increasingly collide, the stakes are rising and the players are getting bigger. _Check out our latest episode with Oasys!_ Youtube: Everything About OASYS - Japanâ€™s Premier Gaming Blockchain | #59 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EZMwhW-asAU) â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” **In Today's Email:** * **What Matters:** Tether Joins Top 20 US Treasury Holders ðŸ‘€ * **Product of the Week:** Concreteâ€™s AUSD Yield Vault on Katana ðŸ’µ * **Charts:** Exchange Volume Hits $1.7T, US Crypto ETFs See $1B Outflows ðŸ“Š You read and share. _We listen and improve_. Send us feedback at [marco@launchy.app](http://marco@launchy.app). â€œ**Narratives: **Stablecoin Power Play _For daily market updates and airdrop alphas, check out our __[telegram!](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)_â€œ â€” View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **WHAT MATTERS** ## **Tether Joins Top 20 US Treasury Holders** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/9e1c9d1b-d9b2-4b3e-9898-76e59995f431/image.png?t=1754295219) Caption: **State of play:** Tether, the issuer of USDT, [has become the 18th largest holder of US Treasuries](https://x.com/immutablejacob/status/1950973494545559976) with **$127B **in government debt, surpassing countries like Germany, South Korea, and the UAE. * This positions the stablecoin issuer as a significant financial player, now trailing only slightly behind sovereign holders like Saudi Arabia. * The majority of Tetherâ€™s reserves are in short-term Treasuries, reinforcing its stance on liquidity and stability as it faces heightened regulatory scrutiny. * This growing exposure may also be a strategic response to upcoming US legislation demanding stricter oversight of stablecoin reserves. **Why it matters**: Tether holding more US Treasuries than major countries shows crypto's growing role in global finance and raises the stakes for stablecoin regulation. **Our take:** Tether isnâ€™t just defending its turf, itâ€™s embedding itself into the heart of traditional finance to stay ahead of regulatory shifts. **For builders and investors:** Stablecoins are becoming key infrastructure. Prioritize assets with strong backing, and watch how crypto ties into sovereign debt markets. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ee9530b4-5ac4-4ca0-88e3-1bd3b03292ad/image.png) Caption: **PRODUCT OF THE WEEK** ## **Concreteâ€™s AUSD Yield Vault on Katana** Tweet: (https://twitter.com/ConcreteXYZ/status/1951266696087421145) Concrete has [introduced](https://x.com/ConcreteXYZ/status/1951266696087421145) a new institutional-grade yield vault for $AUSD holders on the Katana platform. * The vault allocates AUSD across on-chain strategies to generate real yield, with no lockups and active capital management. * Backed 1:1 by fiat via Agora Reserves, AUSD deposits earn $KAT rewards, ecosystem incentives, LP yield, and Concrete Points. * The vault is secured by audited smart contracts from Zellic and Halborn. **Other cool products: ** * [Interport](https://app.interport.fi/), a cross-chain hub. * [Orbit-chain](https://bridge.orbitchain.io/), a multi-asset blockchain. * [ANOME](https://www.anome.xyz/), a fully on-chain PvP card game. * [GemPad](https://gempad.app/), a multi-chain decentralized launchpad. â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” _Take a peek at our referral reward at the bottom of this issue. Share this newsletter and receive our list of 500 crypto VC individuals ðŸ‘‡_ View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/7ff06237-5586-4311-a42e-6dfcbc96db8c/image.png) Caption: **CHARTS OF THE WEEK** ## **Crypto Exchange Volume Hits $1.7T in July** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/e519b761-d833-40ff-8215-cdb520857655/Screen_Shot_2025-08-04_at_15.23.24.png?t=1754295809) Caption: Source: The Block **State of play**: Crypto exchange volume [surged to $1.71T in July](https://www.theblock.co/post/365325/us-crypto-etfs-open-august-with-largest-outflows-in-months-following-record-breaking-july), the highest since February and a **55%** jump from Juneâ€™s** $1.1T**. * Binance led centralized exchanges with **$683B** in volume, while Bitget, Bybit, and Upbit followed. * The spike aligned with a market rally, as Bitcoin hit a record monthly close at $115,644 and Ether soared nearly **50%**. * Decentralized exchange volume also rose to **$435.3B**, with PancakeSwap dominating at $188.6B. **Our take: **The $1.7T volume spike shows real momentum is back. Traders are active, liquidity is flowing, and the rally feels more organic than bot-driven. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/368537c9-5c99-490d-af07-8bd1f4ee7b41/image.png) Caption: ## **US Crypto ETFs See $1B Outflows to Start August** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ad1e06fe-6a65-47eb-a697-ad0d552e8307/Screen_Shot_2025-08-04_at_15.29.21.png?t=1754296165) Caption: Total Bitcoin Spot ETF Net Inflow / Source: SoSoValue **State of play**: After a record-breaking July, US spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs kicked off August with nearly [$1B in combined outflows](https://www.theblock.co/post/365325/us-crypto-etfs-open-august-with-largest-outflows-in-months-following-record-breaking-july). * Bitcoin ETFs saw **$812M** withdrawn, marking their second-worst day ever, while Ethereum ETFs lost **$152M**, breaking a 20-day inflow streak. * Most outflows came from funds like Fidelityâ€™s FBTC, Arkâ€™s ARKB, and Bitwise, while BlackRockâ€™s IBIT and ETHA remained largely unaffected. * The sell-off follows a sharp crypto price dip and comes amid growing interest in new ETF products like staked crypto and potential Solana spot funds. **Our take: **After Julyâ€™s euphoria, August opened with a cold splash of reality. The $1B ETF outflows suggest traders were quick to lock in profits, especially outside of BlackRockâ€™s funds. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/6e5364b7-abf8-4bda-a332-99537a4e101a/image.png) Caption: **QUICK BITES** * **Crypto exchange volume** [surged](https://www.theblock.co/post/365325/us-crypto-etfs-open-august-with-largest-outflows-in-months-following-record-breaking-july) to $1.71T in July. * **Lido** [lays off ](https://www.theblock.co/post/365369/lido-lay-off)15% of workforce for 'long-term sustainability.' * **US crypto ETFs** [open](https://www.theblock.co/post/365325/us-crypto-etfs-open-august-with-largest-outflows-in-months-following-record-breaking-july) August with largest outflows in months. * **Metaplanet** [buys](https://www.theblock.co/post/365359/metaplanet-buys-54-million-bitcoin) $54M worth of BTC, maintains 7th place globally. * **UK regulator** [to allow](https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2025/08/03/uk-regulator-to-allow-retail-investors-access-to-crypto-etns-in-october) retail investors access to crypto ETNs in October. * **Trump Media** [confirms](https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/08/03/trump-media-confirms-usd2b-bitcoin-treasury-and-usd300m-options-strategy-in-q2-2025-earnings-report) $2B BTC Treasury and $300M Options Strategy. * **Crypto Task Force** [will tour](https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2025/08/02/sec-s-crypto-task-force-will-tour-u-s-to-hear-from-small-startups-on-policy-reform) US to hear from small startups on policy reform. * **Coinbase** [slides](https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/08/04/coinbase-slides-nearly-20-in-worst-weekly-performance-since-september-2024) nearly 20% in the worst weekly performance since Sept 2024.
